channel.title: Comments on: My New Band Name
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: It is. When I got one or two of these a week, it kind of balanced out the other spam. But now that the spam floodgate has not opened but <B>burst</B>, I need more compensation than a funny subject line....
item.content:encoded: It is. When I got one or two of these a week, it kind of balanced out the other spam. But now that the spam floodgate has not opened but burst, I need more compensation than a funny subject line….
